Name: Rousing Charlie
Ingredients: 22.5 ml BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: Subtle with an interesting salty edge, this tastes almost like a wine.
History: Created by yours truly (Simon Difford) in 2002 and named after Charlie Rouse, a good friend and fellow lover of sherry.
Nutrition: One serving of Rousing Charlie contains 144 calories
